official_title: Honoring Dr. Earnestine Thomas-Robertson for 31 years of service in Academia at Los Angeles Southwest College (LASC), in the Los Angeles Community College District, the largest community college district in the Nation.

summary.text: Honors Dr. Earnestine Thomas-Robertson for 31 years of service in academia in the Los Angeles Community College District.
